title: Caterer.com Jobs Scraper
description: Scrape hospitality and catering jobs from Caterer.com. Provide either keyword/location OR Caterer.com search URLs. Actor paginates and optionally scrapes detail pages.

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: Array of Caterer.com URLs to start scraping from. If provided, keyword/location filters are ignored.

keyword.title: Keyword
keyword.description: Job search keyword(s), e.g., 'Head Chef', 'Restaurant Manager', 'Sous Chef', 'Bartender'.

location.title: Location
location.description: Location to search for jobs (e.g., 'London', 'Manchester', 'Birmingham'). Leave empty for all locations.

postedWithin.title: Jobs posted within
postedWithin.description: Only keep jobs posted within this time window.

collectDetails.title: Collect job details
collectDetails.description: If enabled, scraper opens job detail pages for full description and additional information.

results_wanted.title: Maximum number of jobs
results_wanted.description: The maximum number of jobs to collect. Leave empty to collect all available jobs.

max_pages.title: Maximum number of pages
max_pages.description: A safety cap on the number of search result pages to visit.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use Apify Proxy (datacenter recommended for Caterer.com).

startUrl.title: Start URL (single)
startUrl.description: Single Caterer.com URL to start scraping from (alternative to startUrls array).

url.title: Direct Job URL
url.description: Direct URL to a specific job listing.

category.title: Category
category.description: Optional job category filter (kept for backward compatibility).
